instructions.name: claim_tips
docs: Claim all tips from tip vault to owner's main vault.

instructions.name: convert_bling_and_charge_to_protocol_treasury
docs: Convert BLING amount to token and charge from user vault to protocol treasury.
If bling_amount is 0, no charge is made.

instructions.name: convert_bling_and_transfer_out_of_fed_user_account
docs: Convert BLING amount to token and transfer from user vault to external account.
If bling_amount is 0, no transfer is made.

instructions.name: send_token
docs: Send tokens from sender's user vault to recipient's user vault.
Direct vault-to-vault transfer without intermediate accounts.

instructions.name: tip
docs: Tip another user from sender's vault to recipient's tip vault.
Tips accumulate in the recipient's tip vault until they claim.
